sourcing.instructions: - Carbon powder and carbon black can be sourced from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces.
steps: - Carbon powder and carbon black can be sourced from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces.
1. In a clean mixing container, combine 256 g of carbon powder and 256 g of carbon black.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean mixing container, combine 256 g of carbon powder and 256 g of carbon black.

steps: 1. Preheat the oven to 120 째C (248 째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat the oven to 120 째C (248 째F).

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool gradually inside the oven for 1 hour.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool gradually inside the oven for 1 hour.

steps: 1. Carefully demold the solid sample and inspect for any imperfections.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Carefully demold the solid sample and inspect for any imperfections.
